title: Didn't receive my dark star icon for winning a game with a 3 man premade
body: Didn't get the icon and was supposed to by at least 11:59 pst yesterday

replies.body: I also didn't get the Icon yet. Would be nice to get it soon ;D
Yeah got the same problem. I have the Cosmic Ruins icon, but not the other one. Would be really nice if you could fix that :)
Hmm yup, it looks like you played a few games with friends!  As I was able to confirm, I've added the CORRUPTION ICON to your account.  :D  Hope you enjoyed the event!

Why was it only for wins T.T

My friends didn't like it enough to play as a group after the first few matches were losses
